content:
Username bug on Jira
Pretty shure I wrote that last comment: https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-23076?focusedCommentId=169590&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Acomment-tabpanel#comment-169590

My name is not Eric Rose. But maybe it is, as I cannot even log onto the New platform :-)
Thanks for sharing this. I'm bringing @Joshua Procious in on it.
Good morning Thomas, I'll ping you in PM to get some information on the account.
This may have been a conversion issue. Let me know if you need my help to chase stuff from gForge.

I'm also having a similar problem and @Yunwei Wang suggested I post here to see if you can help me fix it. I had created an HL7 Confluence account, but am having trouble creating tickets on JIRA.

username is radamson
Hello Reece, I see that you are logging in successfully. Specifically what project are you trying to create issues (tickets) in?
I will be away for a week starting tomorrow. @David Johnson and @Lloyd McKenzie will be able to help you.
@Reece Adamson was trying to create ticket for project FHIR Specification Feedback (FHIR)
He does not have access to that JIRA project, I think.
Yes that one (I think :smile: )
@Thomas Tveit Rosenlund It was a conversion issue. Now fixed.

@Reece Adamson You should have access. In fact, you should have read access even if you don't have an id at all. When you go here (https://jira.hl7.org/projects/FHIR/issues), do you see a 'create' button in the top menu?
@Lloyd McKenzie Everything seems to work now, thanks!
I didn't do a thing, but glad it's working :)
